The video was shared on Facebook on Dece: 2020, and has been viewed more than 54,000 times.
The video: s caption in Hindi translates to English as "See the seditious side of the farmers' agitation in this one-minute video. Kashmir will become Pakistan, Punjab will become Khalistan."
The people in the video can be heard cha: Kashmir will become Pakistan" and "Punjab will become Khalistan."
The video was found to be a longer versi: 2015, showing Sikh protesters shouting pro-Pakistan slogans during a protest against the desecration of the Sikh holy book in Kashmir.
